creditline: Gift of funds from various donors, by exchange
description: silver pot with wood handle; slender spout on side; hinged cover; removable finial, attached to cover with chain; club-like cutout overlay on cover
markings: On edge of finial, four small stamps: [AJH], [(lion)], [U], [(cat\'s head?)]; on shoulder, four stamps: [C & Co], [(lion)], [(cat\'s head?)], [U]; on bottom, stamped: [130 REGENT ST/ CARRINGTON & CO/ LONDON, W.]; on edge of cover, stamped: [C & Co], [(lion)], [U]; on bottom: very lightly incised numbers
object_name: Coffee pot, from two-piece café au lait set
title: Coffee pot, from two-piece café au lait set
